title: AI/ML Engineering Intern
desc: Join our AI team to work on cutting-edge machine learning models. We're looking for someone with Python experience, knowledge of TensorFlow or PyTorch, and interest in natural language processing. You'll work on real-world AI applications that impact millions of users.

title: Backend Developer Intern
desc: Build scalable backend systems using Node.js and Python. Work with microservices architecture, REST APIs, and databases. Experience with AWS, Docker, and Git required. Great opportunity to learn modern development practices in a fast-paced environment.

title: Developer Relations Intern
desc: Help developers succeed with our platform. Create technical content, documentation, and code samples. Experience with JavaScript, Python, or Go preferred. Strong communication skills and passion for developer education essential.

title: Cybersecurity Intern
desc: Protect our infrastructure from cyber threats. Learn penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and security monitoring. Knowledge of Linux, networking, and programming languages helpful. Work with experienced security professionals on real-world challenges.

title: Data Science Intern
desc: Analyze large datasets to drive business decisions. Use Python, R, SQL, and visualization tools. Experience with pandas, scikit-learn, and statistical analysis preferred. Work on projects that directly impact company strategy and growth.

title: Full Stack Developer Intern
desc: Build end-to-end web applications using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Work on both frontend and backend development. Experience with JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and databases required. Learn modern web development best practices.

title: Machine Learning Research Intern
desc: Contribute to cutting-edge ML research projects. Work with deep learning models, computer vision, and NLP. Strong Python skills and experience with PyTorch or TensorFlow required. Collaborate with PhD researchers on publishable work.

title: DevOps Engineering Intern
desc: Automate and optimize our cloud infrastructure. Work with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines. Linux administration and scripting skills preferred. Learn infrastructure as code and modern deployment practices.

title: Data Engineering Intern
desc: Build data pipelines and ETL processes. Work with Apache Spark, Kafka, and cloud data warehouses. Python, SQL, and experience with big data tools preferred. Help process terabytes of data for analytics and machine learning.

title: Security Engineering Intern
desc: Develop security tools and automation. Work on threat detection, incident response, and security monitoring systems. Programming experience in Python, Go, or Rust preferred. Learn about modern security practices and threat landscape.
